Translations.Text: Y ‘Ut. S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa ‘Ayn Saad)
narration tuus Dominus mercy towards His servus Zachariah
He alias his Dominus secret alias
He dictus My Dominus bones turned brittle my corporis my hair est aflame cum gray Prout ego implore Vos my Dominus ego nunquam despair
Ego injuria my dependants me, my uxor est sterile Grant me Vos heres
Let eum est my heres heres Jacob's gens factus eum my Dominus acceptable
O Zachariah nos dedit vos bonus news garcio cognomen est John (Yahya). Nos nunquam created anyone eum ante
He dictus My Dominus ego habet filius my uxor sterility my veteris saeculum
He dictus Sic dictus tuus Dominus est easy Me perfecit. Ego created vos ante ut, vos est nihil
He dictus My Dominus dedit me signum. He dictus Tuus signum est ut vos non speak to people 3 consecutive nox
He advenit his familia sanctuary signaled them Meditate Deus feria ac nox
O John vos uphold scripture strongly. Nos endowed eum cum wisdom, et his youth
Ac (nos endowed eum cum) kindness ex nos purity he est righteous
He honored his parentes est nunquam disobedient tyrant
Pax est upon eum feria he est born feria he abiit feria he resurrected back vita
Mention scripture Mary! She isolated eam familia eastern location
Dum barrier separated eam ex them nos sent to eam noster Anima He iit eam in form human est
She dictus ego seek refuge in the Multus Gracious ut vos est righteous
He dictus ego est messenger tuus Dominus grant vos pure filius
She dictus Quam potuit ego habet filius when non vir touched me; ego nunquam est unchaste
He dictus Sic dictus tuus Dominus It est easy pro Me. Nos render eum signum people mercy ex nos. Hoc est predestined matter
When she bore eum she isolated faraway locus
Genitus process advenit eam trunk palm tree She dictus (ego est ashamed;) Ego wish ego est denatus ante hoc happened completely forgotten
(Infans) alias eam eam dictus non grieve Tuus Dominus provisus vos stream
Vos shake trunk de hoc palm tree it drop ripe datum vos
Eat drink est happy When vos vide anyone dictus ‘ego factus vow silence ego non talking hodie anyone
She advenit eam familia carrying eum. They dictus O Mary vos committed something est totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tuus patris non est malus vir nor est tuus mater unchaste
She pointed eum. They dictus Quam nos talk cum infans crib
infans spoke dictus ego est servus DEUS. He dedit me scripture appointed me prophet
He factus me beatus wherever ego iit enjoined me observe Contact Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat) prout long prout ego vivens
Ego est honor my mater He non factus me disobedient rebel
Pax est me feria ego est born feria ego abiit feria ego get resurrected
Est Jesus filius Mary hoc est truth hoc matter quae they continue doubt
It non befit DEUS ut He genitus est filius He glorified To habet anything perfecit He simply dictus to Est it est
He alias proclaimed DEUS est my Dominus tuus Dominus; vos worship Eum alone Hoc est rectus path
(various parties disputed themselves regarding identity Jesus). Ergo woe to those disbelieve sight terrible feria
Wait dum vos hear them vide them when they advenit face nos! transgressors ut feria totally lost
Warn them feria remorse when judgment proles. They est totally oblivious; they non believe
Nos est the unus inherit terra everyone it nos everyone returned
Mention scripture Abraham; he est saint prophet
He dictus to his patris O my patris vos worship quod potuit nec hear nor vide nor help vos in any via
O my patris ego received certain knowledge ut vos non receive subsequentis me ego guide vos straight path
O my patris non worship devil devil rebelled contra the Multus Gracious
O my patris ego fear lest vos incur retribution ex the Multus Gracious tunc become ally devil
He dictus vos forsaken my deus O Abraham? Vos stop ego stone vos. sinister me
He dictus Pax est vos. Ego implore my Dominus forgive vos; He est Generis me
Ego relinquit vos deus vos worship DEUS. Ego worship unus my Dominus. De imploring my Dominus alone ego non iit wrong
he relinquit them deus they worshipped DEUS nos granted eum Isaac Jacob nos factus each de them prophet
Nos showered them noster mercy nos granted them prenobilis position history
Mention scripture Moses He devoted he est messenger prophet
Nos alias eum rectus side Mount Sinai. Nos brought eum confer eum
Ac nos granted eum noster mercy his frater Aaron prophet
mention scripture Ismail! He est truthful when he factus promise he est messenger prophet
He used enjoin his familia observe Contact Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat;) he est acceptable to his Dominus
mention scripture Idris! He est saint prophet
Nos levabat eum prenobilis rank

These est some de prophets whom DEUS beatus. They chosen descendants Adam descendants de those nos carried Noah descendants de Abraham Israel ex those nos guided selected When revelations the Multus Gracious est recited them they fall prostrate weeping
Post them He substituted generations lost Contact Prayers (Salat) pursued their lusts They suffer consequences
Unus those repent believe lead righteous vita iniit Paradise parvus injustice
gardens Eden await them prout promised de the Multus Gracious those worship Eum et privacy. Certainly His promise advenit pass
They non hear any nonsense therein; unus pax. They receive their provisions therein feria ac nox
Such est Paradise; nos grant it those noster servus est righteous
Nos non advenit command tuus Dominus. To Eum belongs noster elapsus noster future everything inter them! Tuus Dominus est nunquam forgetful
Dominus de caelum terra everything them; vos worship Eum steadfastly persevere in worshipping Eum! Vos know de anyone perfecit aequalis Eum
human est asks "Post ego abiit ego advenit vita
human est forget ut nos perfecit created eum iam he est nihil
De tuus Dominus nos certainly summon them unus devils gather them circiter Hell humiliated
Tunc nos pick each group the multus ardent opponent de the Multus Gracious
Nos know foderator bene those est deserving de burning therein
Omnis single 1 de vos vide it hoc est irrevocable decision tuus Dominus
Tunc nos rescue righteous sinister transgressors it humiliated
When noster revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve dictus to those believe Quae de nos est prosperous? Quae de nos est majoritatatis
Multus generation habet nos annihilated them; they est powerful prosperous

Dictus Those choose iit astray the Multus Gracious testimentum lead them on dum they vide quod promised them! - either retribution Hora. Ut est when they invenit out qui really est malus off infirmus in power
DEUS augments guidance DE those choose guided Pro bonus deeds eternally rewarded tuus Dominus bring far bene returns
Vos noted unus rejected noster revelations tunc dictus ego est dedit wealth infans
he vide future he taken such pledge ex the Multus Gracious
Indeed nos actum quod he utters tunc commit eum to ever-increasing retribution
Tunc nos inherit everything he possessed he advenit nos totus alone
They worship DEUS alius deus (they think est help them)
On the contrary they reject their idolatry est their enemies
Vos non vide quam nos unleash devils disbelievers perfecit stir them up
Est impatient nos preparing them some preparation
Feria advenit when nos summon righteous ante the Multus Gracious in group
Nos herd guilty to Hell, est their eternal abode
Non 1 possess power intercede those conform juris de the Multus Gracious
They dictus "The Multus Gracious genitus est filius
Vos uttered gross blasphemy
Caelum est circiter shatter terra est de to tear asunder montis est circiter crumble
Because they claim ut the Multus Gracious genitus est filius
